name: Super Hero Fight Mad City: Future Battle
name_original: Super Hero Fight Mad City: Future Battle
description:
This action filled super mutant spider hero game allows you to save the mad city and its residents. Play as super spider hero and eliminate evil plans & games of criminals using your super mutant powers. This super hero game is not an average superhero game. It includes the fun of being a superhero as well as all the elements of nonstop action game.


Time for final battle, our spider hero with unique skills is here to fight with mad city mafia villains. Use all your fantastic power as black spider super-hero and marvelous strategy to protect the people and real city. It is a new war! You will love this game while playing and will enjoy story missions with red spider hero in fighting games in future battle. Flying Spider Hero is here it does not need any rope to fly around and fighting to rescue the world. Mafia villains have attacked your city & declared a war of terror. Take down mafia gangster criminals and put an end to their evil games. Strike hard, with aggression and counter enemy attacks swiftly once you enter the down city win battle war.


Fight your way through all of terrorist mafia gangsters to secure mad city residents. Your sharp fighting skills will help you killing mafia gangsters quickly. Don’t allow enemy terrorist mafia gangsters to counter your attacks. You are the super spider hero everyone is depending on. Only you can save the residents, end this war and restore the peace of mad city. Other than combat the enemy terrorist using your super punches and kicks. Battle the enemy with all your flying power and skills. Combat with no fear & successfully complete this action combat filled mission and win this war against the evil mafia gangsters.


Features:
Realistic open city 3D environment
Fly, fight & save real city like a super hero
Rescue missions of city residents
Plenty of challenging mission in action simulator game
Melee combat system to fight with mafia gangster


Download this game and give us your feedback, so we can make more new action game for you.
